column4: hmm sound works in Skype and at the login prompt but nowhere else....what can I do to resole this?
what kind of problem are experiencing?...
I do not hear sound from many apps.  I do hear sound when I login and on Skype.  but not in vlc or when I use preferences > sound > test button
you mean with music you've got problems right?..
music or videos or ubuntu sound events
if I can get the System > Preferences > Sound Preferences ... test buttons and such to work  I think that will solve my problems.
is it codecs problem?.. or you can't hear nothing at all...
I hear nothing when I press the Test buttons ..(any of them) on my Sound Preferences
go to: system -> preferencies -> sound preferencies
try to use different modules...
for example: use ALSA, then try with OSS, switch different modules and le me know if something works..
ok OSS ones work.  is that going to be a problem that ALSA or autodetect does not work?
yes, exactly.. :-)
use OSS and relax.. :-D
ok thanks for your help
you're welcome... ;-)
ugg still no sound in vlc .... or xbmc  I guess I have to go manually configure them to use OSS now too?
vlc somewhere there should have option to change default module...
switch it use OSS instead of ALSA..
there is  I've got vlc working using OSS .... now I'm digging around in XBMC.....I wonder what has happened that Auto (in sound preferences has stopped working)
there could be lots of problems...
thanks for giving me something to work with
you're welcome, always glad to be helpful... :-)
sorry, i have to go now....
